name: Ghost Flight
summary: You can suppress your tether to the ground, overcoming your resistance to fly free.
description:
You can suppress your tether to the ground, overcoming your resistance to fly free. For 10 minutes, your fly Speed doesn't restrict you to only a few inches off the ground, allowing you to travel to any height you choose.Ghost Flight Leads To...

Unlimited Ghost FlightTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
